resources.string: Walang Internet connection available. Try again a bit later.
Walang mahanap na game sa search query nyo. Please try again with less keywords.
Maraming salamat sa pag report sa issue na ito. Maasahan nyo ang mabilis namin pag responde.
Maraming salamat po sa pag rate! Ang rating nyo po na i rehistro na.
Ang login data ay na padala na sa email nyo.
Ang username na ito na gamit na.
Ang email na ito ay hindi valid.
Ang email address na ito ay gamit na.
Nag ka problema sa pag gawa ng account na ito. Please try again a bit later. If the problem remains you can also register at www.cheat-database.com/register.
Walang user na nakita na gumagamit ng email address na ito.
Hindi ma retrieve and ni request na data. Please try again a bit later.
Error: No member data could be found.
Something just went wrong. Please try again.
Na i add na ang cheat sa favorites.
Cheat already exists in your favorites.
Wala pang napiling favorites. Bago ma access ang view na ito kailangan mo magdagdag ng favorite muna.
The forum for this cheat is yet empty. Be the first to write something. Tip: Favorite this cheat so you can come back to the forum easier.

Salamat sa pag submit! We will review the cheat and will inform you by email if we are going to add it to the database. By the way: You can edit or delete your submitted cheats via our website www.cheat-database.com.
Meron mali sa pag submit ng cheat. Please try again.
Information sa pag submit ng cheat

Thanks for submitting a cheat to us, we really appreciate your help! However, before you write a cheat, please read our short writing guidelines which makes your submitted cheats easier to understand for other readers.

 - Use capital letters for character or object names. Always use a capital letter after a full stop.

 - Try not to make long sentences. Short sentences are easier to understand. Try not to use "then" to connect sentences either.

 - Don't use "I did" or "it helped me" etc. in sentences. Use the third person for instructions.
I hereby agree that my submission may be grammatically altered and corrected in order to meet the minimum quality levels required.
There are no email clients installed.
